#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{	long long unsigned int n1,f1=1,f2,i,count,n2;
	while(1)
	{
	cin>>n1>>n2;
	if(n1==0 && n2==0) break;
	count=0;
	f1=1;f2=2;
	while(1)
	{i=f2;
	 f2=f2+f1;
	 f1=i;
	 if (f2>n2) break;
	 if(f2>=n1 && f2<=n2) count++;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
